precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Line up all three cubes on your left side using your right hand.
Grab the orange cube with your right hand.
Bring the orange cube to the edge of the table on your right side.
Grab the blue cube with your right hand.
Bring the blue cube to the edge of the table on your right side.
Reach for the green cube with your right hand.
Place the green cube under the blue cube, at the edge of the table on your right side.
